txt.en: Orcs have planted their banners in the haystacks found dotting Marton's farmlands.\n\nThese crude flags are an insult to the Rohirrim who lived here before their town was captured, and should be torn down.
You have torn down many Orc-flags from defiled haystacks in Marton's farmlands.
Orcs have planted their banners in the haystacks found dotting Marton's farmlands.
Tear down Orkish banners from haystacks ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
You have torn down many Orc-flags from defiled haystacks in Marton's farmlands.
Crude Orkish flags can be found in Marton's farmlands in the northern Westfold.\n\nYou should tear down the Orc-flags from the haystacks in which they are planted.
